GameData

Class Fruit

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameData.Fruit

  • public class Fruit
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that represents a "fruit" in the pacman game.
    Author:
    Oranit, Tal, Amitai

    • Constructor Detail

      • Fruit

        public Fruit(int id,
             double lat,
             double lon,
             double alt,
             double wei)
        A regular constructor.
        Parameters:
        id - An ID for every fruit in the field
        lat - is the x coordinate
        lon - is the y coordinate
        alt - is the z coordinate
        weight - is the score, the pacman gets when he eat the fruit
